item.description:
The American Australian Association and KEA
invite members and friends to attend

Anzac Day 2010

3.30pm, Sunday, April 25, 2010
Appleton Chapel
The Memorial Church Harvard University
One Harvard Yard, Cambridge, MA 02138



Reception to follow at Dudley House, Harvard University,
where guests are welcome to bring a plate to share.

Please register to assist with chapel seating numbers.

http://www.americanau...

Generously sponsored by the
Harvard University Committee on Australian Studies.

Thanks also to the Boston Demons for their support.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Anzac Day Service
